Posts.Content: Thank-you Dr. Lim! I have just received my CT Scan results and am a little freaked-out. My Oncologist said it’s just a little Blip in the road, but I would appreciate your opinion on this! New finding of incidental pulmonary embolism involving the lobar arteries, segmental subsegmental branches of both lower lobes as well at the segmental and subsegmental branches of the right upper lobe. My Oncologist has prescribed: Dalteparin Sodium Injection 18 000 IU (anti-factor Xa) With Thanks! Necie Edited October 17, 2018 at 9:07 am
Posts.Title: Ask the Expert: Breast cancer oncologist Dr. Bora Lim returns
